12 (interval direction matters):

6 5 8 3 10 7 1 2 0 4 9 11
5 6 3 8 1 4 10 9 11 7 2 0

6 5 8 3 10 7 11 9 2 4 0 1
5 6 3 8 1 4 0 2 9 7 11 10

6 5 8 3 10 11 7 9 2 0 4 1
5 6 3 8 1 0 4 2 9 11 7 10


12 (direction doesn't matter):

6 5 7 4 8 3 9 2 10 1 11 0
5 6 4 7 3 8 2 9 1 10 0 11

6 7 4 9 5 3 10 1 11 0 8 2
5 4 7 2 6 8 1 10 0 11 3 9

6 7 5 8 3 9 2 10 1 11 0 4
5 4 6 3 8 2 9 1 10 0 11 7
